condition_details.condition_comment: KidAid
MEDICAID
FOODSTAMPS
If Not Any of these programs, Report Results Anyway

action_details.action_comment: Calculate the Individual Incomes
Get the Group Size for each individual
Evaluate for KidAid
Evaluate for MEDICAID
Evaluate for FOODSTAMPS
Build a set of Result Objects to report to the caller

policy_statement.policy_description: Evaluate the clients in the case for the KidAid program
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "Evaluate the clients in the case for the KidAid program"

policy_statement.policy_description: Evaluate the clients in the case for Medicaid
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "Evaluate the clients in the case for Medicaid"

policy_statement.policy_description: Evaluate the clients in the case for Food Stamps
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "Evaluate the clients in the case for Food Stamps"

condition_details.condition_comment: We include all earned income
We don't include all unearned income types

action_details.action_comment: Add this income to the total income for this client

policy_statement.policy_description: Adding {income.amount} to the client total income
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "Adding " income.amount cvs strconcat " to the client total income" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: Adding {income.amount} to the client total income
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "Adding " income.amount cvs strconcat " to the client total income" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The income {income.amount} is not earned and is an excluded income type
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The income " income.amount cvs strconcat " is not earned and is an excluded income type" strconcat

attribute_fields.COMMENTS: Calculates the Group Size for Each Person by looking at the relationships between people

context_details.context_comment: For each client in the group, we need to calculate a group size (we only need to do this for applying clients)
context_details.context_description: for all clients whose applying == true
context_details.context_postfix: { dup applying true beq if } clients forall pop

context_details.context_comment: We want to compare a client against every other client in the case, so we set up a local variable to point to ThisClient
context_details.context_postfix: client cve allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: Now consider the client in respect to all the other clients in the case (We need to consider all clients in the case, even if not applying)

condition_details.condition_comment: Are we consider the client themselves?
Include ThisClient's parents
condition_details.condition_description: the client is the parent of ThisClient
condition_details.condition_postfix: /source client /target 0 local@ /type parent relationships findmatch swap pop

condition_details.condition_comment: Include ThisClient's siblings
condition_details.condition_description: the client is the sibling of ThisClient
condition_details.condition_postfix: /source client /target 0 local@ /type sibling relationships findmatch swap pop

condition_details.condition_comment: Include ThisClient's children
condition_details.condition_description: the client is the child of ThisClient
condition_details.condition_postfix: /source client /target 0 local@ /type child relationships findmatch swap pop

condition_details.condition_comment: Include the unborn children in some cases
Is this client older than 18

action_details.action_comment: Count the Client himself and particular relatives
Add 1 for each of the expected babies for a pregnant person
action_details.action_postfix: expectedChildren 0 local@ entitypush IncomeGroupCount + /IncomeGroupCount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_comment: Add this person's Income to the ThisPerson's total group income
action_details.action_description: add the client.totalIncome to ThisClient's totalGroupIncome
action_details.action_postfix: client.totalIncome 0 local@ entitypush totalGroupIncome + /totalGroupIncome xdef entitypop

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is self, is not pregnant, so add 1 to This Client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is self, is not pregnant, so add 1 to This Client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is self, and pregnant, so add 1 + the number of expected children to this client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is self, and pregnant, so add 1 + the number of expected children to this client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is the parent of {ThisClient's client_id} , is not pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is the parent of " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat " , is not pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is the parent of {ThisClient's client_id}, and is pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is the parent of " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat ", and is pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is the sibling of {ThisClient's client_id} , is not pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is the sibling of " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat " , is not pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is the sibling of {ThisClient's client_id}, and is pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is the sibling of " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat ", and is pregnant, so add 1 to this client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is the child of {ThisClient's client_id}, so add 1 to the client's IncomeGroupCount
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is the child of " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat ", so add 1 to the client's IncomeGroupCount" strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, ({client.totalIncome}) to This Client's total group income.
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, (" s+ client.totalIncome cvs strconcat ") to This Client's total group income." strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, ({client.totalIncome}) to This Client's total group income.
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, (" s+ client.totalIncome cvs strconcat ") to This Client's total group income." strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, ({client.totalIncome}) to This Client's total group income.
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, (" s+ client.totalIncome cvs strconcat ") to This Client's total group income." strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The client {client.client_id} is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, ({client.totalIncome}) to This Client's total group income.
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " is older than 18, so add the total income of the client, (" s+ client.totalIncome cvs strconcat ") to This Client's total group income." strconcat

policy_statement.policy_description: The relationship between the client {client.client_id} and this client {thisclient's client_id} is not self, parent, or sibling
policy_statement.policy_statement_postfix: "The relationship between the client " client.client_id cvs strconcat " and this client " s+ 0 local@ entitypush client_id entitypop cvs strconcat " is not self, parent, or sibling" strconcat

context_details.context_description: for all clients whose applying == true
context_details.context_postfix: { dup applying true beq if } clients forall pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL = the Federal Poverty Limit calculated for the number of people in this client's Income Group.
context_details.context_postfix: FPL_Base FPL_PerAdditionalPerson client.IncomeGroupCount 1 - * + cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL125 = 125 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 1.25 fmul cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL150 = 150 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 1.5 fmul cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL175 = 175 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 1.75 fmul cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL200 = 200 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 2 * cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL250 = 250 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 2.5 fmul cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_comment: FPL300 = 300 percent of the Federal Poverty Limit
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ 3 * cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

condition_details.condition_comment: You have to be a Citizen
Make sure this case is in the appropriate county
condition_details.condition_description: The CoveredCounties includes the string case.county_Cd

condition_details.condition_comment: Exclude under the FPL
Exclude under 125 percent of the FPL
Exclude under 150 percent of the FPL
Exclude under 175 percent of the FPL
Exclude under 200 percent of the FPL
Exclude under 250 percent of the FPL
Include if not excluded and under 175 of the FPL
Include if not excluded and under 200 of the FPL
Include if not excluded and under 250 of the FPL
Include if not excluded and under 300 of the FPL

action_details.action_comment: set the program Level
Provide reasons for rejection

action_details.action_description: Add "Client is eligible for Medicaid, so cannot enroll in KidAid" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "Client is eligible for Medicaid, so cannot enroll in KidAid" client.notes swap addto

action_details.action_description: Add "Must Provide Validation of Citizenship" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "Must Provide Validation of Citizenship" client.notes swap addto

action_details.action_description: Add "Case must be within a KidAid County" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "Case must be within a KidAid County" client.notes swap addto

action_details.action_description: Add "Must be 18 or younger to qualify for KidAid" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "Must be 18 or younger to qualify for KidAid" client.notes swap addto
100.0 totalGroupIncome fmul 0 local@ fdiv cvi /client_fpl xdef

attribute_fields.COMMENTS: At this time we are not evaluating Medicaid Clients

condition_details.condition_comment: Is this client applying for this program?

action_details.action_comment: Reject the client
Note rejection reason
action_details.action_description: add "The System does not yet support Medicaid Applications" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "The System does not yet support Medicaid Applications" client.notes swap addto

attribute_fields.COMMENTS: At this time we are not evaluating Food Stamp Clients

condition_details.condition_comment: Is this client applying for this program?

action_details.action_comment: Reject the client
Note rejection reason
action_details.action_description: add "The System does not yet support Food Stamp Applications" to client.notes
action_details.action_postfix: "The System does not yet support Food Stamp Applications" client.notes swap addto

attribute_fields.COMMENTS: This table is really unnecessarily complicated. All the client information can be accessed by the calling code, as we are including a reference to the client in the Result. An exercise for the reader would be to eliminate all the copying of information from the client to the Result object. Remove these fields from the Result object in the EDD, remove the logic in this table, and update the test code to get the data from the client object.

context_details.context_description: for all clients whose applying == true
context_details.context_postfix: { dup applying true beq if } clients forall pop

action_details.action_comment: Create a Result Record
action_details.action_description: add a new Result entity to the context of this table

action_details.action_comment: Add the record to the list on the job
action_details.action_description: add the result to the job.results

action_details.action_comment: Add the case notes to the result notes
action_details.action_description: Add the case.notes to the Result.notes

action_details.action_comment: Add the client notes to the result notes
action_details.action_description: Add the client.notes to the Result.notes

action_details.action_comment: Copy the client ID
Point the Result to the client
Set the Result to the program we processed
Set the Result programLevel to that recorded on the client
Set the Result eligible flag to that recorded on the client
Set the Result Federal Poverty Level to the client's
Set the Result's totalGroupIncome to the clients.
